Since it was brought up and I was thinking about it:

Ixidor, Reality Incarnate, 5UU

Legendary Creature - Wizard Avatar

Flash

Protection from colorless

When ~ enters the battlefield, turn all face-down creatures face up.

Whenever another permanent leaves the battlefield, return it to the battlefield face-down under its owner's control.

_"Reincarnation was a bit too much of an abstract idea for me."_ - Ixidor

5/7
